list.name: SLEEP-STIMULATOR
list.description: Sandy falls asleep for x seconds and his health is fully restored.
list.descriptionHtml: Sandy falls asleep for x seconds and his health is fully restored.

list.name: SWEET-DREAMS
list.description: Sandy's next attack lulls opponents to sleep for x seconds. They will, however, wake up from any damage.
list.descriptionHtml: Sandy's next attack lulls opponents to sleep for x seconds. They will, however, wake up from any damage.
